title: Gavin's Cookies
author: Gavin Look
content: I am donating a box of Gavin's chocolate chip cookies.

title: S'mores Girl Scout Cookies
author: Roger Schmidt
content: This is Vika's favorite flavor of Girl Scout Cookies. And this box won't have pistacchios.

title: Cheese Ice Cream
author: Keeghan O'Brien
content: I don't know why Vika loves this stuff, but she does.
